trans-unit.source: Provides a regular expression to parse an ASP.NET data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 提供規則運算式剖析 ASP.NET 資料繫結運算式。

trans-unit.source: The DatabindExprRegex class provides a compiled regular expression to parse an ASP.NET data-binding expression (`<%#` …
trans-unit.target: DatabindExprRegex 類別提供已編譯的規則運算式剖析 ASP.NET 資料繫結運算式 (`<%#` ...

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions> classes are used internally by the .NET Framework to parse ASP.NET pages.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions>類別用於在內部.NET Framework 所剖析的 ASP.NET 網頁。</xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.DatabindExprRegex"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.DatabindExprRegex"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor instantiates a compiled regular expression whose predefined regular expression pattern is `\G<%#(?<code>.*?)?%>`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的預先定義的規則運算式模式所編譯的規則運算式會具現化`\G<%#(?<code>.*?)?%>`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.DatabindExprRegex"></xref> class with a specified time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.DatabindExprRegex"></xref>類別指定的逾時值。

trans-unit.source: The `A_1` parameter represents the maximum time interval during which the regular expression engine tries to find a match before the operation times out and a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> expression is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `A_1`參數表示的最大時間間隔期間的規則運算式引擎會嘗試尋找相符項目，作業逾時之前，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>運算式就會擲回。</xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: A time-out interval, or <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=fullName> if matching operations should not time out.
trans-unit.target: 逾時間隔，或<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=fullName>如果比對作業不應逾。
